name: straitjacket
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a strong piece of special clothing that ties the arms to the body and is used for limiting the movements of dangerous prisoners and mentally ill patients whose behaviour is violent: Brody was locked in a padded cell and forced to wear a straitjacket.
Brand X Pictures/Stockbyte/GettyImages
disapproving something that severely limits development or activity in a way that is damaging: He refused to be fitted into any ideological straitjacket.
